pr_title: Allows custom blocks to use the fluid overlay texture

timeline.bodyText:
I wonder if there would be a benefit on calling this shouldDisplayFluidOverlay, and include the IFluidState seen in the world, as a parameter?
EDIT: Wait, I just realized, I never merged the custom overlay textures for modded blocks, did I?
grumbles and goes find the branch where he was doing that
timeline.author: gigaherz

replies.bodyText: I can name it that if it is preferred, I wasn't really sure on what I should name it.
replies.author: pupnewfster

timeline.message: Allows custom blocks to define if they should use the fluid overlay instead of the flowing texture when in a fluid
